verses.verse: וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <S%H7971><s%> sent [חִירָם כ] (חוּרָ֨ם <S%H2438><s%> Hiram ק) מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king צֹ֥ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre מַלְאָכִים֮ <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִיד֒ <S%H1732><s%> to David וַעֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> and timber אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> of cedars וְחָרָשֵׁ֣י <S%H2796><s%> and carpenters קִ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> with masons וְחָרָשֵׁ֖י <S%H2796><s%> artificer עֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> trees לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build ל֖וֹ בָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> him an house

וַיֵּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> perceived דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> And David כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֱכִינ֧וֹ <S%H3559><s%> had confirmed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> him king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִשֵּׂ֤את <S%H5375><s%> was lifted up לְמַ֙עְלָה֙ <S%H4605><s%> on high מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <S%H4438><s%> for his kingdom בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> the sake עַמּ֥וֹ <S%H5971><s%> because of his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel פ

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> And David ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more נָשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> more wives בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem וַיּ֧וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> begat דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> and David ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> of more בָּנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> more sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> Now these [are] the names הַיְלוּדִ֔ים <S%H3205><s%> of [his] children אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become ל֖וֹ בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> which he had in Jerusalem שַׁמּ֣וּעַ <S%H8051><s%> Shammua וְשׁוֹבָ֔ב <S%H7727><s%> and Shobab נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> Nathan וּשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> and Solomon
וְיִבְחָ֥ר <S%H2984><s%> And Ibhar וֶאֱלִישׁ֖וּעַ <S%H474><s%> and Elishua וְאֶלְפָּֽלֶט׃ <S%H467><s%> and Elpalet
וְנֹ֥גַהּ <S%H5052><s%> And Nogah וְנֶ֖פֶג <S%H5298><s%> and Nepheg וְיָפִֽיעַ׃ <S%H3309><s%> and Japhia
וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <S%H476><s%> And Elishama וּבְעֶלְיָדָ֖ע <S%H1182><s%> and Beeliada וֶאֱלִיפָֽלֶט׃ <S%H467><s%> and Eliphalet

וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> And when the Philistines כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִמְשַׁ֨ח <S%H4886><s%> was anointed דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> that David לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> over all Israel וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> went up כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> all the Philistines לְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> [of it] and went out לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> against

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines בָּ֑אוּ <S%H935><s%> came וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֖וּ <S%H6584><s%> and spread בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> themselves in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> of Rephaim

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> enquired דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> And David בֵּאלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַאֶֽעֱלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> Shall I go up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against [פְּלִשְׁתִּיִּים כ] (פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> Philistine ק) וּנְתַתָּ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> for I will deliver בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> them into thine hand וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֤וֹ יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah עֲלֵ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> unto him Go up וּנְתַתִּ֖ים <S%H5414><s%> will give בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> your hand

וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> So they came up בְּבַֽעַל־ פְּרָצִים֮ <S%H1188><s%> to Baalperazim וַיַּכֵּ֣ם <S%H5221><s%> smote שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there דָּוִיד֒ <S%H1732><s%> and David וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> them there Then David פָּרַ֨ץ <S%H6555><s%> hath broken in הָֽאֱלֹהִ֧ים <S%H430><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוֹיְבַ֛י <S%H341><s%> upon mine enemies בְּיָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> by mine hand כְּפֶ֣רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> like the breaking forth מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of waters עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָֽרְא֛וּ <S%H7121><s%> therefore they called שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בַּ֥עַל פְּרָצִֽים׃ <S%H1188><s%> Baalperazim

וַיַּעַזְבוּ־ <S%H5800><s%> And when they had left שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their gods וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> gave a commandment דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> there David וַיִּשָּׂרְפ֖וּ <S%H8313><s%> and they were burned בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire פ

וַיֹּסִ֤יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> yet again עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> yet פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֖וּ <S%H6584><s%> spread themselves abroad בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <S%H6010><s%> in the valley

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> enquired ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> Therefore David בֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> again of God וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> and God לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַֽעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> unto him Go not up אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> after הָסֵב֙ <S%H5437><s%> them turn away מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and וּבָ֥אתָ <S%H935><s%> from them and come לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> in מִמּ֥וּל <S%H4136><s%> upon them over against הַבְּכָאִֽים׃ <S%H1057><s%> the mulberry trees

וִ֠יהִי <S%H1961><s%> become כְּֽשָׁמְעֲךָ֞ <S%H8085><s%> And it shall be when thou shalt hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a sound הַצְּעָדָה֙ <S%H6807><s%> of going בְּרָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> in the tops הַבְּכָאִ֔ים <S%H1057><s%> of the mulberry trees אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> then תֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> [that] then thou shalt go out בַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָצָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> is gone forth הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> for God לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before לְהַכּ֖וֹת <S%H5221><s%> thee to smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> the host פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> therefore did דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> David כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֖הוּ <S%H6680><s%> commanded הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> as God וַיַּכּוּ֙ <S%H5221><s%> him and they smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines מִגִּבְע֖וֹן <S%H1391><s%> from Gibeon וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far גָּֽזְרָה׃ <S%H1507><s%> even to Gazer

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went out שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> And the fame דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> of David בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> into all lands וַֽיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּחְדּ֖וֹ <S%H6343><s%> the fear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of him upon all nations
